row.justified: Rally Tripmeter is an application specially designed to help rally driving and the activities associated with it.

It has currently over 4 thousand total downloads and 2,4 thousand current installs. For a small community of rally (co)drivers this is quite big usage. The rating of the application is over the 4.5 mark. All the feedback I have got is been very positive, there are known users from the top drivers in Estonia (Including Raigo Mölder, the codriver of Ott Tänak) and even users from FIA (The federation of international autosport).

The application was almost rebuild about six months ago. The functionality changed were small, but the code was refactored totally. The purpose of the rework was, that the initial project structure was sloppy and it was hard to maintain.
